synonyms.synonym: Protein inhibitor of neuronal nitric oxide synthase

protein.specific_function: Regulates apoptotic activities of BCL2L11 by sequestering it to microtubules. Upon apoptotic stimuli the BCL2L11-DYNLL1 complex dissociates from cytoplasmic dynein and translocates to mitochondria and sequesters BCL2 thus neutralizing its antiapoptotic activity

reference.reference_text: Dick T, Ray K, Salz HK, Chia W: Cytoplasmic dynein (ddlc1) mutations cause morphogenetic defects and apoptotic cell death in Drosophila melanogaster. Mol Cell Biol. 1996 May;16(5):1966-77.
